highlights.summary:
The Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad or IIMA is a Business School of the public type, and was founded in 1961 situated in Vastrapur, Ahmedabad. MHRD, Government of India has given IIM Ahmedabad an Institute of National Importance status. The European Foundation Management Development accredited Ahmedabad IIM campus as the first B-School in the year 2003.
History: In 1964, a 2-year PG degree in Business Administration came into existence as a flagship program.
Rankings: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad Gujarat is ranked 1st by NIRF 2025 under the Management category, 1st for the Executive MBA by Business Today 2024, and again 1st by Outlook 2025 under the Top Public B-School in India category. Globally, the IIM A Ahmedabad is ranked 27 by the QS WUR Ranking By Subject 2025.
Academics: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad courses are recognised by UGC and offered at the PG, PhD, and various other levels. These courses are provided across various specialisations in Management. An MBA from IIM Ahmedabad is considered a flagship course, which is offered at a multi-cultural campus.
Curriculum: IIMA Ahmedadbad course curriculum consists of several parameters as a part of the overall programme. The Institute has resources that further helps in diversifying the portfolio of the students and gain global exposure. In addition to this, several institutional collaborations favour in securing internships within the time frame of the respective courses. These internships, capstone projects, placements and research projects are further considered as professional experiences that are considered as a part of the curriculum.
Placements: IIMA offers placement assistance to students. The highest Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad packages offered to PGPX students in 2025 were INR 76.5 LPA. IIM Ahmedabad has recorded a 100% placement rate for the 2025 placement drive. Top recruiters such as Boston Consulting Group, TCS, Goldman Sachs, and others visited the campus for placements.
Some of the important highlights regarding IIM Ahmedabad are listed below:

college_info_program.intro:
MBA is the flagship programme offered by IIMA. MBA students are taught to make the right decisions in the face of difficult business challenges. They are trained through case method courses, FIELD projects, etc. MBA is taught by expert faculty members. The college provides global exposure to students through student exchange programmes.
The Institute offers an MBA on the basis of the CAT entrance exam and a minimum aggregate of 50% in graduation. For CAT 2025 eligibility, candidates must obtain a bachelor's degree with a professional degree in CA/ CS/ ICWA (CMA)/ FIAI with a minimum percentage.
IIMA offers 385 seats in total for PGP admissions through CAT. Furthermore, there is no age limit to appear for the CAT examination. Moreover, the cost of an MBA at IIM Ahmedabad includes tuition fees ranging from INR 12 Lakh to INR 25 Lakh, depending on the specialisation opted for.
The Institute offers an MBA for a duration of 16 months to 2 years. MBA students can plan their careers in Management Consulting and various other fields. IIM Ahmedabad's MBA students can become Marketing Managers, Business Analysts, and Investment Bankers, and can take up various other job roles.

Sports and extracurricular activities are also present, in which we have the opportunity to play at the state and national levels.

admission.title: IIM Ahmedabad Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text:
IIM Ahmedabad admission 2025 is primarily entrance-based . This institute is known for its two-year , full-time , residential flagship PGP (also referred to as MBA) programme that offers admission based on a valid score in CAT . The percentile of CAT for IIM Ahmedabad reached up to 99.6 in the past years which shows how rigorous it is for a student to get admission to this institute. IIM-A admission cycle for PGP commences every year with the start of CAT registrations.

Apart from PGP, IIM A also offers other PG and doctoral degree courses in the field of Management . Candidates are shortlisted for these programmes based on course-specific entrance exams, followed by shortlisting processes which generally comprise a Personal Interview (PI) round. IIM Ahmedabad admission to all courses is done through the scores of various entrance exams, followed by other admission criteria.

faqs.question: Is admission to MBA at IIM Ahmedabad confirmed if I score 100 percentile in CAT?
faqs.answer: There is a good chance of receiving an interview call from IIM Ahmedabad, however, admission isn’t guaranteed even at 100 percentile. The overall criteria includes academic profile, that is your Class 12, Class 10 and graduation marks. The college also gives a score for work experience, hence, candidates must have 2-3 years of experience to get maximum points. Additional focus is also given to gender and academic diversity. Considering all these factors and candidates’ CAT score, IIM Ahmedabad prepares a composite score through which decides whether to finalise a student or not. IIM Ahmedabad or any other IIM, for that matter, doesn’t give direct admission only on the basis of CAT percentile, the first phase of admission process is giving the CAT exam. Students must clear the sectional and the minimum final cut-off to be eligible and considered for the call. After that, they must get shortlisted for the interviews and group discussion process. After all these rounds, a final list of shortlisted candidates is prepared.

faqs.question: What is the selection process for IIM Ahmedabad?
faqs.answer: IIM Ahmedabad's selection criteria is entrance-based for the offered courses. Students need to meet both the basic eligibility and clear the selection rounds as well. Check out the table below to know about the selection criteria for IIM Ahmedabad: CAT + Analytical Writing Test (AWT) + Personal Interview (PI) CAT/ GMAT/ GRE/ IIMA Admission Test (IAT) + Personal Interview (PI) Valid GMAT/ GRE score + Essay submission + PI round

faqs.question: Is studying at IIM Ahmedabad expensive?
faqs.answer: Yes, IIM Ahmedabad is certainly costly. IIM Ahmedabad total fees ranges between INR 64,000 and INR 33 lakh . The fees vary depending on the programme and specialisation selected by the students. The fee for certain programmes certainly falls in the higher end of the spectrum. Students need to pay INR 25 lakh as IIM Ahmedabad MBA fee. However, considering the fact that IIMA is one of the top-rate IIMs and limitless oppurtunities students can experience at the institute, it might be considered a worthwile investment. Further, the institute also offers financial aid to its students.

faqs.question: Can I pursue E-MBA at IIM Ahmedabad?
faqs.answer: Yes, students can pursue Executive MBA programme at IIM Ahmedabad . The institute provides the course for working professionals. The tuition fee for the E-MBA programme at IIM Ahmedabad is around INR 33 lakh .

faqs.question: What is the fee for the ePGD-ABA programme at IIMA?
faqs.answer: As per the official website, the total fee is INR 12 Lacs (inclusive of all taxes). The programme fee is inclusive of tuition fee, course materials fee, student's stay and food during campus visits and other service facilities, such as libraries, etc. Students can pay this programme fee in two instalments. The institute shares the fee structure along with the admission offer. For the ease of the students, IIM-A also has tie-ups with multiple banks to offer collateral-free education loans.

faqs.question: What are the minimum eligibility requirements for admission to PGP at IIM Ahmedabad?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for IIM Ahmedabad MBA admissions, a candidate needs to pass a bachelor’s degree or equivalent qualification from a UGC-recognised university after at least 12 years of school education with a minimum of 50% aggregate or equivalent CGPA (45% in case of SC/ ST/ PwD candidates). Candidates, appearing for the final year of their bachelor's degree with final year results awaiting, can also apply. However, such candidates, if selected, will be granted provisional admission, only if a candidate submits a pre-final certificate signed by competent authorities of the previous institute/ university, the latest by June 30 of the year of admission.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: IIM Ahmedabad Campus is built in the heart of the city. It is spread over 102 acres and is tastefully designed with extensive green spaces . IIMA campus represents the institute’s educational philosophy – critical thinking, orientation to real life, and active intellectual self-reliance. Work on the IIM Ahmedabad campus began in 1962 and was carried out by renowned architect, Louis Kahn . He designed the campus with sustainability in mind. Moreover, the campus has something for everyone with gardens, trails, and playgrounds to sports facilities and meditation nooks and cafes. Read on to learn more about the IIMA campus, hostel, student life, and more.

sections.heading: IIM Ahmedabad Campus Highlights
text: IIMA campus's key highlight is its sustainability quotient. Green living educates everyone living on the campus on sustainable practices. This is achieved through solar power plants, rainwater harvesting, solid waste management, and nurseries. Find below more highlights of the IIM Ahmedabad campus:

Moreover, the IIMA restoration project encircles around the restoration, conservation, and repair management of Louis I Kahn buildings for the classroom complex, Vikram Sarabhai library campus, 18 dormitories buildings, and faculty blocks.

sections.heading: IIM Ahemdabad Hostel
text: IIM-A student housing is inclusive of 25 understudy apartments with an overall capacity of 740 occupants. Additionally, single-room dormitories are also available for married students. In the student dorms, each floor has 10 single rooms along with a dining area. Further, the single-room dorms buildings house common areas, and sometimes snack outlets as well. Moreover, shared and single-occupancy rooms are available for both Boys and Girls.

text: The facilities available in the IIM-A hostels are listed below:
list: Dorms with TV, washing machine, refrigerator

sections.heading: IIM Ahmedabad Hostel Life
text: The hostel life at IIM Ahmedabad allows candidates to collaborate with each other and share ideas. With the sports facilities and more on-campus facilities, a candidate gets a breather between studies. Check out the following video to get an idea about how is life at IIM-A:

sections.heading: IIM Ahmedabad Library
text: IIM-A library is named after the founder of the institute: Dr. Vikram Sarabhai. It is counted as one of the best Management libraries in Asia. Students get a plethora of material to study and learn from. The Vikram Sarabhai Library (VSL) houses over 2 lakh books, 3 lakh e-books, 165+ databases along with e-newspapers, thesis, working papers, and more. Moreover, it is open 24x7 and ensures user-friendly access.

sections.heading: IIM Ahmedabad Sports Facilities
text: IIM Ahmedabad facilitates various sports facilities through indoor and outdoor courts, along with multiple gymnasiums and yoga studios. The outdoor sports facilities available include cricket ground, volleyball court, football field, and cycling track. Additionally, the indoor sports facilities available are a swimming pool, snooker room, squash courts, indoor badminton court, and multiple board games.
Check out the below images for some of the sports facilities:

sections.heading: Places to visit in & around the IIM Ahmedabad Campus
text: IIM-A campus is located in Vastrapur. From the IIM Ahmedabad campus, there are various places that students of IIM-A can visit, including Harappan sites, Jain temples, ancient Buddhist caves, and more. Further, more hangout places near the campus are:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: IIM Ahmedabad Vikram Sarabhai Library has a collection of over 1,94,704 books, 19815 online and 146 print journals, 46,024 bound volumes, 2624 working papers, 349 thesis, 2187 student's project reports. It offers access to current, global and relevant information in various formats (print & non-print) to serve the information needs of the academic fraternity. The strength of the library is its digital collection of 71 databases, accessible from any networked computer within the campus which provides scholarly, company and industry information. Open carrels are provided in the stack area for individual study. IIMA library provides specialized tools like EBSCO Discovery. It also provides RemoteXS facility to current students and faculty.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad has different cafes functioning on the campus such as TANSTAAFL CAFE, Food King, Coffee Express outlet. Institute also have mess facility for the students getting admission in different courses.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: IIM- A has 25 student dormitories with a total capacity to hold about 740 occupants. Apart from the dormitories, there are separate housing facilities available for married candidates. The dorms have ten single rooms on each floor arranged around a stairway and a tearoom. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals are served. The rooms are fully furnished including a telephone connection. The dorms also have a T.V., washing machine and refrigerator.
